thread.title: Raiders add returner Walter Powell from Bills practice squad
thread.title_full: Raiders add returner Walter Powell from Bills practice squad

title: Raiders add returner Walter Powell from Bills practice squad
text:
CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE ALAMEDA, Calif. (AP) â€” The Oakland Raiders have signed return specialist Walter Powell off the practice squad of the Buffalo Bills.
Powell's agent Brian McLaughlin said on his Twitter account Friday that Powell is joining the Raiders' active roster.
Powell played four games for the New York Jets last year. He returned eight kicks for 233 yards and 12 punts for 48 yards. He was cut before the season and joined Buffalo's practice squad.
The Raiders had been seeking a full-time returner. Starting safety TJ Carrie injured his chest returning a punt two weeks ago and kick returner Taiwan Jones is nursing a foot injury.
Oakland had an empty roster spot after waiving safety Keenan Lambert on Thursday.
